name: Harlan Voss

idle: Once a Ranger, always a Ranger. Even when the badge is gone.
Jax… that boy always ran toward danger. Must’ve gotten that from me.
serious: The NCR thinks they own the Mojave. They don’t. Nobody does.
FizzCo’s experiments… I saw things during my service I was ordered to forget.
emotional: Jax, if you’re hearing this… I failed you. I failed your mother.
I left the NCR to protect my family. Turns out the danger followed anyway.
ranger_memory: The Rangers taught me to track storms, men, and lies.
Vault 77 wasn’t on any NCR map. That scared me more than anything.

notes: Decorated NCR Ranger veteran; left the service after uncovering classified FizzCo/Vault-Tec operations.
